remarks: One of the conditions showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice.  (This corresponds to axiom "ax-r2" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
qlaxr2.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
qlaxr2.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
qlaxr2.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
qlaxr2.4 $e |- A = B $.
qlaxr2.5 $e |- B = C $.
qlaxr2i $p |- A = C $.
